title: Store not working at all ????
body:
Whenever I try access the store I get a message saying  "The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly."
this started a couple of days ago and hasnt changed since I havent found any answers yet why is this happening rito?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Close LoL
Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects or wherever you've installed LoL.
Delete the folder lol_air_client
Start up LoL and let the launcher redownload it

That fixed it for me

Same issues I'm getting, yeah... oddly, the NA server status page lists the issue, but it's supposedly fixed in OCE?

Not for me, though.

I wouldn't say 'fixed', just unnoticed.

Or it could just be *another* issue that has similar end-results.
NA is getting a similar, but not exactly the same, problem as OCE is in regards to accessing the Store. Riot know this and are actively working on a fix.
getting the same problem. dunno what else to do.
